Name: Agile
Description: Gain +10 agility

Name: Angry
Description: Does not like to be disturbed. If so they will attack.

Name: Anxious
Description: Gain +5 agility but -2 mind

Name: Big
Description: While big you are about twice the size you are originally. You have +5 attack on creatures smaller than you, but -5 attack on creatures bigger than you

Name: Brainy
Description: Gain +10 mind

Name: Cautious
Description: Lose 2d6 when interacting with NPCs

Name: Egotistical
Description: Lose -5 mind

Name: Elderly
Description: Lose -5 strength and -5 agility but gain +10 mind

Name: Epic
Description: Gain +10 in all stats

Name: Fast
Description: Gain a +4 to speed.

Name: Feeble
Description: Lose -5 strength and -5 agility minimum 1 each.

Name: Friendly
Description: Generally will not attack unless attacked first. If an enemy is friendly you can choose to not fight them but you gain no loot

Name: Greedy
Description: Your mind is consumed until you get the object of your greed.

Name: Hungry
Description: Lose -5 on all stats and cannot roll a 1d6 on checks until you eat or stop being hungry.

Name: Ignorant
Description: Generally doesn’t know what’s going on around it.

Name: Legendary
Description: Gain +20 on all stats

Name: Macho
Description: Gain +10 strength

Name: Normal
Description: Nothing seems different that you can tell.

Name: Optimistic
Description: Gain a +1d6 when interacting with NPCs

Name: Pessimistic
Description: Lose one action per turn minimum of 0 actions.

Name: Sensitive
Description: Lose 1d6 when interacting with NPCs but gain 1d6 when attacking an enemy

Name: Serious
Description: Gain +5 mind

Name: Shy
Description: Lose 1d6 when interacting with NPCs

Name: Slimy
Description: Gains +6 to being grappled or put into a bag or shackled.

Name: Slow
Description: Slow creatures have a -3 to their speed with a minimum of 0.

Name: Small
Description: Target shrinks to about half their original size. While small you gain +5 attack on creatures bigger than you, but -5 attack for creatures smaller than you.

Name: Strong
Description: Gain +5 strength

Name: Weak
Description: Lose -5 to strength with a minimum of 5.

Name: Young
Description: Gain +5 strength and +5 agility but -10 mind minimum 1
